channel.title: another 100 things HL taught us!
channel.description:
Ello' everybody!
I am fully aware that a thread with (kinda) the same name has already been created, I do however feel sad as i remember how f*cked up that thread turned out to be after number 100
So considering how freaking funny the first 100 posts were, and how i just wanna be a part of da community.. I have created this thread!
btw plz don't fuck this thread up with nonfunny posts like "alyx likes it up the ass".. it's just not funneh
anyway - i'll go first
1. Even though you have gone through extensive MIT education n all that, u basically do the same job as a janitor
2. No one will hate you for being a part of the team who created the resonance cascade and made aliens come to earth and gave the combine (who come from science and outer space) the opportunity the enslave mankind n beat them up n shit... quite the contrary - humans will somehow respect you, die for your cause and even insist that you tap their daughter

item.title: another 100 things HL taught us!
item.dc:creator: CatzEyes93
item.description:
chokopopswtf:

okay then, fail thread is fail i guess… so much for placing your hope of eternal goodness and rainbows in people

fuck u all, post something of use or plz go bite on a crowbar

  1. u can’t create a forum thread about HL (or anything 4 that matter) cuz bscly everyone are douchebags who love flaming you… sadface :{

… or…

  1. Know that if you try to re-create something that has already been done a million times, then anything that happens to you is your own dam fault.

Read full topic

item.title: another 100 things HL taught us!
item.dc:creator: Mr.Shadow
item.description:
Maxey:

They should just shut off the forums and reopen them on release day. We’re completely out of ideas by now and our only source of entertainment is to insult each other.

Mr. Shadow is a faggot btw. :3

:3

Read full topic

item.title: another 100 things HL taught us!
item.dc:creator: smileyman
item.description:
HL taught us that you could kill an enemy by hiting him with a hand grenade without making it explode near him.

item.title: another 100 things HL taught us!
item.dc:creator: freundin88
item.description:
First……… welcome to the community. One thing I learned about HL was that having a “dead aim” while shooting six or seven times into the bad guys, doesn’t always mean you’ll get em. Another…… no matter how many times you play the game, you never get use to the parts you HATE!

Read full topic

item.title: another 100 things HL taught us!
item.dc:creator: bur
item.description:
1. The first thread wasn’t funny.
  2. What makes you think doing the same thing in another thread will suddenly make it work?
  3. GTFO.

Read full topic
